QuestData.Title: Making Contact
QuestData.Description: I can't believe that Nespirah would willingly allow these naga to take residence inside her shell. As I see it, one of two things has happened: they have convinced her to willingly join their cause, or they have weakened her to a point where she cannot fight back. Either one is bad.$b$bHere in this chamber, I should be able to communicate directly with Nespirah. Let us find out for ourselves. Speak to me when you are prepared, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Observe as Earthmender Duarn attempts to communicate with Nespirah.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Earthmender Duarn inside Nespirah in Vashj'ir.
QuestData.CompletionText: Nespirah needs our help. If nothing else, I can sense that.
QuestData.RewardText: That didn't go well. For some reason, the beast won't speak back to me.$b$b<Duarn is clearly frustrated.>$b$bIf only Erunak had not left us! He would know what to do.
